mapper.select: SELECT u.fk_user_id, ANY_VALUE(u.nickname) as nickname, a.pk_artwork_id, ANY_VALUE(a.artwork_name) as artwork_name FROM wx_user u, ecm_artwork a, ecm_artwork_broadcast_history abh WHERE abh.fk_artwork_id = a.pk_artwork_id AND abh.fk_user_id = u.fk_user_id GROUP BY u.fk_user_id, a.pk_artwork_id

SELECT ANY_VALUE (u.nickname) AS nickname, u.fk_user_id, ANY_VALUE (a.artwork_name) AS artwork_name, a.pk_artwork_id FROM ecm_statistics_timeline st, wx_user u, ecm_artwork a WHERE st.is_active = 1 AND u.fk_user_id = st.fk_user_id AND a.pk_artwork_id = st.fk_artwork_id GROUP BY u.fk_user_id, a.pk_artwork_id

SELECT ANY_VALUE (u.nickname) AS nickname, u.fk_user_id, ANY_VALUE (a.artwork_name) AS artwork_name, a.pk_artwork_id FROM ecm_statistics_timeline st, wx_user u, ecm_artwork a WHERE st.is_active = 0 AND u.fk_user_id = st.fk_user_id AND a.pk_artwork_id = st.fk_artwork_id GROUP BY u.fk_user_id, a.pk_artwork_id

(SELECT u.fk_user_id, IFNULL (u.nickname, "未认证") AS nickname, a.pk_artwork_id , ANY_VALUE (a.artwork_name) AS artwork_name, st.fk_artwork_detail_id, an.video_url,an.items_text, '主动点击故事线' AS act_type FROM ecm_statistics_timeline st, wx_user u, ecm_artwork a , ecm_artwork_nodes an WHERE st.is_active = 0 AND u.fk_user_id = st.fk_user_id AND a.pk_artwork_id = st.fk_artwork_id AND an.pk_detail_id = st.fk_artwork_detail_id)
UNION ALL
(SELECT u.fk_user_id, IFNULL (u.nickname, "未认证") AS nickname, a.pk_artwork_id , ANY_VALUE (a.artwork_name) AS artwork_name, sba.fk_artwork_detail_id, an.video_url,an.items_text, '主动点击退出到发现页面' AS act_type FROM ecm_statistics_broadcast_actions sba, wx_user u, ecm_artwork a , ecm_artwork_nodes an WHERE sba.act_type = 'exitToFind' AND u.fk_user_id = sba.fk_user_id AND a.pk_artwork_id = sba.fk_artwork_id AND an.pk_detail_id = sba.fk_artwork_detail_id )
ORDER BY fk_user_id
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(a.pk_artwork_id,'x♀x',REPLACE(a.artwork_name,',','，')) AS line_titles FROM ecm_artwork a WHERE a.artwork_name IS NOT NULL AND a.artwork_status = 1
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(u.fk_user_id,'x♀x',REPLACE(IFNULL(u.nickname,"未认证"),',','，')) AS row_titles FROM wx_user u
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ecm_statistics_broadcast_actions (act_type, fk_artwork_id, fk_artwork_detail_id, fk_user_Id, current_play_time, start_time) values (#{actionType}, (SELECT ad.fk_artwork_id FROM ecm_artwork_nodes ad WHERE ad.pk_detail_id = #{videoId}), #{videoId}, #{userId}, #{currentPlayTime}, sysdate() )
